pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Adaptive Allocation Using Deep Reinforcement Learning // An implementation to compute an optimal adaptive allocation rule using deep reinforcement learning in a dose-response study (Matsuura et al. (2022) doi:10.1002/sim.9247). The adaptive allocation rule can directly optimize a performance metric, such as power, accuracy of the estimated target dose, or mean absolute error over the estimated dose-response curve.
